survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Car Wash Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and preferences regarding contactless car wash services to enhance service quality and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless car wash services?
questions.client_notes: Consider using a frequency scale to capture usage patterns accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless car wash services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a contactless car wash service?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand priority factors.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a contactless car wash service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of your vehicle after using a contactless car wash service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who have used the service before (Q1 not 'This is my first time')
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of your vehicle after using a contactless car wash service?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who have used the service before (Q1 not 'This is my first time')

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless car wash services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless car wash services?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our contactless car wash service to others?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who have used the service before (Q1 not 'This is my first time')
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge willingness to recommend.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who have used the service before (Q1 not 'This is my first time')
